query.query:
query {
  HistoricalAgent(id: "agent-suggest-600") {
    iD # Misspelled 'id' to trigger suggestions
    typ # Misspelled 'type' to trigger suggestions
    identifer # Misspelled 'identifier' to trigger suggestions
    descriptin { # Misspelled 'description' to trigger suggestions
      nam # Misspelled 'name' to trigger suggestions
      languagCode # Misspelled 'languageCode' for suggestion
      typeOfEntty # Misspelled 'typeOfEntity' for suggestion
      datesOfExistnce # Misspelled 'datesOfExistence' for suggestion
      biographicalHistor # Misspelled 'biographicalHistory' for suggestion
      leglStatus # Misspelled 'legalStatus' for suggestion
      generalContxt # Misspelled 'generalContext' for suggestion
      occupatin # Misspelled 'occupation' for suggestion
      otherFormsOfNem # Misspelled 'otherFormsOfName' for suggestion
      paralelFormsOfName # Misspelled 'parallelFormsOfName' for suggestion
      plac # Misspelled 'place' for suggestion
      functons # Misspelled 'functions' for suggestion
      mandats # Misspelled 'mandates' for suggestion
      scrip # Misspelled 'scripts' for suggestion
      sourcs # Misspelled 'sources' for suggestion
    }
  }
}
